Bash(git -C "C:\Users\YeaDaddy\Documents\GitHub\OSFG_Development" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Optimize optical flow shader with fully parallel search

Major performance improvement to optical flow computation:
- Rewrote shader to be fully parallel (all 64 threads work, not just 1)
- Each thread now evaluates ~3-4 search positions from the 17x17 search area
- Added parallel reduction using shared memory to find global minimum SAD
- Reduced search radius from 16 to 8 (17x17 = 289 positions total)

Performance results:
- Optical flow GPU time: 159ms -> 29ms (5.6x faster)
- Total pipeline GPU time: 162ms -> 31ms (5.2x faster)
- Base FPS: 7 -> 18.3 FPS (2.6x faster)
- Output FPS with 2x: 14 -> 36.7 FPS
